Export the project data using the Export module, Project form, or Planning Console. Save the export file to a folder on your system in the Microsoft Project (MPP), XML, or CSV format.

questions.question_text: Which of the following are true regarding how the My Project Space (Project Workspace) handles dynamic content? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BD
Row 1 displays project name, state, project manager name, and important project dates. The displayed project dates are based on the current state of the project:
If the project state is Pending or Open, planned start date and planned end date are displayed.
If the project state is Work in Progress, actual start date and planned end date are displayed.
If the project state is Closed, actual start date and actual end date are displayed.

Selected Answer: BD
B,D is correct

Selected Answer: BD
Best I could find.
https://docs.servicenow.com/en-US/bundle/utah-it-business-management/page/product/project-management/task/configure-project-card-parameters.html

choices.D: If the project state is Work in Progress, actual start date and planned end date are displayed.
choices.C: If the project state is Draft, actual start date and actual end date are displayed.
choices.A: If the project state is On Hold, actual start date and actual end date are displayed.
choices.B: If the project state is Pending or Open, planned start date and planned end date are displayed.
